rows.label: qev092101_MSG0001
rows.name: Tika's asked us to join a new Skell weapon test today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Something about a laser that can track
targets burrowing underground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0003
rows.name: Kinda ruins the magic, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0010
rows.name: Talk Offense

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that a giant sword is the best magic around.

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0020
rows.name: Talk Defense

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that a giant shield is the best magic around.

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0030
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that weapons should be convenient and useful.

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0004
rows.name: Ah, you're one of those, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0005
rows.name: I guessed you'd be more mature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0006
rows.name: Oh, please. Like your tastes are any different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0007
rows.name: Exactly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0008
rows.name:
The enemy's going crazy attacking
and you're guarding all stoic like "Nope!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0009
rows.name: You're both certifiable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0010
rows.name: Ugh! There's no talking to pragmatists.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0011
rows.name: You and Tika would get along well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0012
rows.name: Our tastes are certainly closer than yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0013
rows.name:
The ridiculously specific things you love
have no general-purpose use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0014_m
rows.name: Even our friend here seems to realize they're pointless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0014_f
rows.name: Even our friend here seems to realize they're pointless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0015
rows.name: Now hold on just aâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0016
rows.name: Sorry, Alexa. Today's test is canceled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0017
rows.name:
The weapons test Camber's team was on went bad.
We're still assessing the damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0018
rows.name:
They've all gone missing, and any clues
were destroyed when the prototype blew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0019
rows.name: Were they in their Skells at the time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0040
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0041
rows.name: Chastise Alexa for thinking of the Skells first.

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that it's a good question.

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0020
rows.name:
N-no, that's not what I meant!
If they were in Skells, it's less likely they were hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0021
rows.name: As far as we know, they were.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0022
rows.name:
But things went so wrong,
we don't even know where they are now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0023
rows.name: Assuming the best may be...optimistic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0024
rows.name: They were, as far as we know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0025
rows.name: Which means there's a good chance they survived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0026
rows.name: Right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0027
rows.name:
But things went so wrong,
we don't even know where they are now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0028
rows.name: Assuming the best may be...optimistic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0029
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0030
rows.name: I'm going to look for them. You'll come too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that you're ready to go.

rows.label: qev092101_JNK0070
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev092101_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that this isn't your job.

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0031
rows.name: You got a good heart, you know that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0032
rows.name:
With the two of us on the case,
I'm sure we'll find them in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0033
rows.name: All right. Whenever you're ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Camber and Mika are in trouble.
If we don't act now, it may be too late.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0035
rows.name: True, time is of the essence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0036
rows.name: See? We have to go now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0037
rows.name:
There won't be any tests for a while either way,
so I won't stop you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0038
rows.name: Just be careful, okay? Both of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0039
rows.name: That, and... Be prepared for the worst.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Tests are on indefinite hold until we can figure out the
cause of these explosions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0041
rows.name:
It could be enemy sabotage, so we need to be really
careful here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092101_MSG0042
rows.name:
You guys should go help Camber and the rest
however you think is best.[ST:wait ]
